Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 7 or gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 in south. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6, increasing 7 or gale 8 for a time in south.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough, occasionally high later in south. in northeast, moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, snow. In northeast, occasional snow.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally very poor. In northeast, good, occasionally very poor.

Southeasterly gale force 8 increasing severe gale force 9 later
